snippet.title: "Revue Starlight Re LIVE" Game Systems
snippet.description:
In preparation for the imminent release, check out this video showing some of the game systems!

The original stories found in the game are broken into three main categories: the "Main Story", which follows the story of new auditions; "School Stories", which tell the story of each school; and "Bond Stories", which contain small episodes of the individual Stage Girls.
We also take a look at the battle system, character growth system, and "My Theater" system!

Pre-register for Revue Starlight Re LIVE now!

◆Official Website
https://www.en.revuestarlight-relive.com
